document_data.name: Springs of D'onto Yeudo
document_data.mainbody:
The '''springs of D'onto Yeudo''' was a mythical location said to lie on the island of [[Saishu]], off the coast of [[Koryo]] in [[northeast Kara-Tur|northeast]] [[Kara-Tur]].<ref group="note">It is unknown if "D'onto Yeudo" is a person, place, or something else.

The springs of D'onto Yeudo were one of the local legends that [[Dan Zor]], the former king and governor of Saishu, wished to investigate. By [[1357 DR]], he sought adventurers who could find the mythical springs for him.
